original_text: Many people will fall against that rock. They will fall to the ground and it will hurt them. They will become caught in a trap.’
korean_text: 많은 사람들이 그로 말미암아 걸려 넘어질 것이며 부러질 것이며 덫에 걸려 잡힐 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Many people will fall against that rock.
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람들이 그 바위에 부딪혀 넘어질 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They will fall to the ground

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것이 그들에게 상처를 줄 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They will become caught in a trap.'
